text: Kim Ok-gyun (Korean: 김옥균; 1851 – 1894) was Korean Joseon Dynasty politician and diplomat. His nicknames were Gowoo (Korean: 고우, 古遇) and Gokyun (Korean: 고균, 古筠). == Books == * Kihwageunsa (기화근사, 箕和近事) * Chidoyakron (치도약론, 治道略論) * Gapsinillok (갑신일록, 甲申日錄) == References == * http://100.naver.com/100.nhn?docid=31693 * http://navercast.naver.com/contents.nhn?contents_id=4870 Category:1851 births Category:1894 deaths Category:Korean politicians Category:Korean educators Category:Korean murder victims Category:Korean autobiographers
title: Kim Ok-gyun
